description:
He has a similar look to Daisuke wearing with clear vision in episode 9 and Episode 10 a suit with a black blazer, a vest and a white shirt. He has a small beard and moustache and is hair is cut short. He has HEUSC on a sliver ring on the index finger of his left hand. He has many wrinkles and has a slim body.
Source: fandom.com
name: Kanbe Shigemaru
